mapper.insert: insert into assessment_explain (id, uuid, is_delete, create_date, create_by, update_date, update_by, message) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{message,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update assessment_explain set uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, message = #{message,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, uuid, is_delete, create_date, create_by, update_date, update_by, message from assessment_explain
